infos.value: Here are some items that may prove useful in your guild. Please use them as you see fit.
If you took a liking to this guild during your trial period, you should consider joining as an official member.
Mock Guild Battles allow you to practice with other guild members as much as you wish, so I do hope you take advantage.
• Guild Trials •

• Guild Trials •
By participating in a Trial, you can use Guild functions for seven days
.
• Attendance •

• Attendance •
Here, you can see how many guild members are attending. Members acquire rewards based on the total number of members in attendance and the level of your Guild Statues.
• Gifts •

• Gifts •
Gifts can be sent to fellow Guild Members.
• Shrine •

• Guild Statues •
Various stas bonuses can be received by enhancing Guild Statues.
• Guild Quests •

• Guild Quests •
You can earn rewards and contribute to your Guild by taking daily Guild Quests.
• Barracks •

• Barracks •
JP and shards can be obtained by giving units Provisions.
• Guild Battles •

• Guild Battles •
You cannot participate in Guild Battles while in a Trial, but you are able to perform Mock Guild Battles outside of the Guild Battle period.
• Guilds •
Proceed to a tutorial on Guilds?
Yes
No
